faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your inquiries about the AI Boomerang Effect

items.title: What types of videos work best with the AI Boomerang Effect?
items.description: Any short video clip can be transformed! Whether it's action shots, dance moves, or scenic views, the AI effectively captures movement and creates a stunning loop.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the AI Boomerang Effect?
items.description: Absolutely! Users enjoy a free allotment of 30 credits per day, perfect for creating multiple loops. Subscriptions for extensive use are also available.

items.title: Can I share my boomerang clips commercially?
items.description: Yes! Subscribers can use produced content for any purpose, while free-tier users may use clips for personal projects only.

items.title: How is my video data protected?
items.description: We process all clips in-browser, ensuring zero upload to external servers, thus guaranteeing privacy and security.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Stunning Video Loops?
